DOC.brief_summary: In descriptive study , purpose determine knowledge level attitude people Nevsehir , Turkey organ donation . It determine people live Nevsehir sufficient knowledge organ donation , various concern issue , want receive information Organ Donation Units . It use exemplification internalization educational curriculum increase organ donation .
DOC.brief_title: The Knowledge Levels Attitudes People Living Nevşehir Organ Donation Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose In descriptive study , purpose determine knowledge level attitude people Nevsehir organ donation . Methods The data study collect questionnaire apply 414 people reside Nevşehir February May 2016 . In evaluate data , number , percentage calculation , Chi-Square Test , t-test , One-Way test use .
DOC.criteria: Anyone aged 2065 The people live city center Nevşehir , Turkey < 20 year old 65 year old The people live city center Nevşehir , Turkey
